title: Are there examples of script writing scripts? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you go to amazon.com and type in the search box “"screenwriting books,” you'll find a huge variety of books on the subject, and many of them will have at least samples of partial scripts, along with descriptions of how to go about writing one. There are also websites which make some scripts available. Just ask Mr. Google.

Lots — check your local public library; if they don't have a title you want, they can probably get it from an inter-library network Also, you'll find there are multiple versions for same script — usually the original one that sealed the deal, and then multiple versions of shooting scripts incorporating changes made during the filming
How to Write a Screenplay: Script Writing Example & Screenwriting Tips http://www.wikihow.com/Write-a-Screenplay Best of Luck;)
